title: St. Francis of Assisi: A Biography
description: Reviewers have judged St. Francis of A Biography to be that rarity among books about a popular work of inspiring spiritual reading that is also an acclaimed work of modern scholarship. With spiritual insight and careful historical judgment, Omer Englebert blends the many facets of St. Francis' personality into a portrait of a saint who can inspire men and women today. A Servant Book.
author: Omer Englebert
